humanum_full_description_en:
" sword " inscriptions as " Qian " from " gold ", " Qian " sound, Xiaozhuan for " Jian ", " Qian " is " the sword beginning of the text" of the original meaning of ancient weapons, edged on both sides, the middle ridge , Short handle. Bronze writing is used as the original meaning. Teacher Tongding: "Rongding 20, shop 50, 鐱 (sword) 20." "Shu Wen": "People lead soldiers. From the blade to the sound. Sword, Yanwen from the knife." "Guanzi‧Di "Numbers": "Water comes out of the mountain of Ge Lu, and the gold flows from it. Chi You is controlled by the sword, armor, spear, and halberd."

" Sword " can mean swordsmanship. "Zhuangzi·Said the Sword": "The former Zhao Wenwang liked his sword, and the swordsman fought at the door with more than 3,000 people, fighting each other day and night.

" Sword " also means to assassinate with a sword. "The Legend of Dong Guan Han-Kou Xun": "(Jia Fu) said that left and right said: I see Xun today, and I must use the sword."
humanum_short_description_en: " sword " inscriptions as " Qian " from " gold ", " Qian " sound, Xiaozhuan for " Jian ", " Qian " is " the sword beginning of the text" of the original meaning of ancient weapons, edged on both sides, the middle ridge , Short handle.
humanum_full_description:
「劍」金文作「鐱」，從「金」，「僉」聲，小篆作「劒」，「鐱」是「劍」的初文，本義古兵器，兩面有刃，中間有脊，短柄。金文用作本義。師同鼎：「戎鼎廿，鋪五十，鐱(劍)廿。」《說文》：「人所帶兵也。从刃僉聲。劍，籒文劒从刀。」《管子‧地數》：「葛盧之山發而出水，金從之。蚩尤受而製之以為劍、鎧、矛、戟。」

　　「劍」可表示劍術。《莊子‧說劍》：「昔趙文王喜劍，劍士夾門而客三千餘人，日夜相擊於前。」

　　「劍」還表示用劍刺殺。《東觀漢記‧寇恂傳》：「（賈復）謂左右曰：吾今見恂，必手劍之。」
humanum_short_description: 「劍」金文作「鐱」，從「金」，「僉」聲，小篆作「劒」，「鐱」是「劍」的初文，本義古兵器，兩面有刃，中間有脊，短柄。

①古代的一種兵器：寶劍。長劍。劍鞘。劍術。劍拔弩張(形容形勢緊張，一觸即發，後亦喻書法雄健)。刻舟求劍。

「 劍 」金文作「 鐱 」，從「 金 」，「 僉 」聲，小篆作「 劒 」，「 鐱 」是「 劍 」的初文，本義古兵器，兩面有刃，中間有脊，短柄。金文用作本義。師同鼎：「戎鼎廿，鋪五十，鐱(劍)廿。」《說文》：「人所帶兵也。从刃僉聲。劍，籒文劒从刀。」《管子‧地數》：「葛盧之山發而出水，金從之。蚩尤受而製之以為劍、鎧、矛、戟。」 「 劍 」可表示劍術。《莊子‧說劍》：「昔趙文王喜劍，劍士夾門而客三千餘人，日夜相擊於前。」 「 劍 」還表示用劍刺殺。《東觀漢記‧寇恂傳》：「（賈復）謂左右曰：吾今見恂，必手劍之。」

Bronze writing is used as the original meaning. Teacher Tongding: "Rongding 20, shop 50, 鐱 (sword) 20." "Shu Wen": "People lead soldiers. From the blade to the sound. Sword, Yanwen from the knife." "Guanzi‧Di "Numbers": "Water comes out of the mountain of Ge Lu, and the gold flows from it. Chi You is controlled by the sword, armor, spear, and halberd." " Sword" can mean swordsmanship. "Zhuangzi·Said the Sword": "The former Zhao Wenwang liked his sword, and the swordsman fought at the door with more than 3,000 people, fighting each other day and night. " Sword" also means to assassinate with a sword. "The Legend of Dong Guan Han-Kou Xun": "(Jia Fu) said that left and right said: I see Xun today, and I must use the sword."

劍字的基本解释

劍
jiàn
见“剑”。

劍字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiàn］
［《廣韻》居欠切，去梵，見。］
亦作“剣1”。亦作“劒1”。亦作“劔1”。“剑1”的繁体字。亦作“釰1”。亦作“釼1”。亦作“鐱1”。
(1)古兵器名。属短兵器。两面有刃，中间有脊，短柄。参阅《周礼·考工记·桃氏》。
(2)指剑术。
(3)用剑刺杀。
(4)指用剑割削。
(5)挟；抱。
(6)带剑；佩剑。
(7)通“斂”。《逸周书·文酌》：“一大知率謀，二大武劍勇。”朱右曾注：“劍，斂也。斂小勇以養大勇也。”一说，“劍當讀爲驗，言大武所以驗其勇也。劍、驗竝從僉聲，故得通用。”见俞樾《群经平议·周书》。
(8)地名。四川剑山的简称。
(9)地名。云南剑川的简称。

劍字的康熙字典解释

【子集下】【刀字部】　劍； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页144第45
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】?居欠切，檢去聲。【玉篇】籀文劒。【說文】人所帶兵也。【釋名】劒，檢也，所以防檢非常。【管子·地數篇】葛盧之山，發而出金，蚩尤受而制之，以爲劒鎧矛戟。又操劒殺人亦曰劒。【潘岳·汧督馬敦誄序】漢明帝時有司馬叔持者，白日于市，手劒父讎。

劍字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
劍字的起名意思

暂无。

sword
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiàn］
["Guang Yun" is not cut, go to Brahma, see. ]
Also known as "剣1". Also known as "劒1". Also known as "劔1". Traditional characters for "剑1". Also known as "釰1". Also known as "釼1". Also known as "鐱1".
(1) Names of ancient weapons. It is a short weapon. There are blades on both sides, a ridge in the middle, and a short handle. See "Zhou Li·Kao Gong Ji·Tao Shi".
(2) Refers to swordsmanship.
(3) Assassinate with a sword.
(4) Refers to cutting with a sword.
(5) Hold; hold.
(6) With sword; saber.
(7) Through "convergence". "Yi Zhou Shu·Wen Jue": "A great knowledge and tactics, two great swords and courage." Zhu Youzeng's note: "Sword, grabbing also. Capturing small courage to raise great courage." One said, "Sword should be read as Experience, Yan Dawu test his bravery. Sword and experience are combined from the sound of the same, so they are universal." See Yu Yue's "Quan Jing Ping Yi · Zhou Shu".
(8) Place name. Abbreviation for Sichuan Jianshan.
(9) Place name. Abbreviation for Jianchuan, Yunnan.
